content:
Welcome to your first post using Hugo with the PaperMod theme!
This is a sample post that demonstrates:
Front matter with title, date, tags, categories, and summary Markdown formatting How to show the post in the home page’s recent posts section Heading 2 You can write in Markdown. Here are some examples:
Code Block echo "Hello, Hugo!"
summary: A short summary of this sample post.
title: Sample Post for PaperMod

content:
Building a blog or documentation site? Hugo + PaperMod is a powerful combo.
In this post, weâ€™ll walk through:
Why Hugo is insanely fast ðŸš€ What makes PaperMod a perfect theme Tips to get the most out of your site Why Hugo? Hugo is a static site generator written in Go. Itâ€™s known for:
Blazing fast builds Markdown-based content Powerful templating system Great for SEO Why PaperMod? PaperMod is a theme with:
Clean UI/UX Built-in support for tags, categories, search Dark/light mode toggle Easy to customize Featured Image Example If you added the line in front matter:

summary: Learn how to harness the speed and elegance of Hugo with the modern PaperMod theme.
title: Exploring the Power of Hugo and PaperMod
